title: About Agents of Tech
missionText:
Agents of Tech was founded in 2015 as the official Technology Club at Taylor's University. Since the beginning, we have devoted ourselves to the gaining and distribution of knowledge of anything technology related to any students who are interested.

Our goal is to bring more valuable knowledge and develop technological skills in students to be ready for the work environment of the 21st century.

features.title: Our Mission
features.description:
The mission of Taylor’s University Agents of Tech (AoT) Club is to serve as the premier platform for fostering a dynamic and inclusive community of technology enthusiasts within Taylor’s University.

Our mission is rooted in the dedication to acquiring and disseminating knowledge in all facets of technology, creating a space where passionate students and educators can collaborate, learn, and innovate.

We aim to empower individuals with diverse backgrounds to develop their technological skills and be well-prepared for the challenges of the 21st-century work environment.

features.title: Our Vision
features.description:
Our vision is to be a leading force in advancing technological knowledge and skills, making a positive impact not only within our university but also in the broader community.

Through our initiatives, we strive to empower our members to be catalysts of positive change and leaders in the technology-driven landscape.

features.title: What We Do
features.description: We organize hackathons, workshops, and guest lectures. We build real-world applications and contribute to open source ecosystems.
